scripts.start: parcel serve client/client.ts client/static/comment.ts client/{demo,index}.html client/static/themes/{light,dark}.styl -d templates/web --port 5000
scripts.build: rm -rf templates/web && parcel build client/client.ts client/static/comment.ts client/index.html client/static/themes/{light,dark}.styl -d templates/web --experimental-scope-hoisting --no-content-hash
